title: Sierra Leone Declares Quarantine, As Ebola Outbreak Worsens
teaser: A surge of new cases in West Africa's Ebola virus outbreak has health officials worried that the epidemic is getting worse. Sierra Leone, for one, has declared a state of emergency, sending in troops to quarantine some of the hardest hit communities.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
